transcript:
Customer: Bolo sir 5 baje tak test karna hota hai chalo.
Executive: Amount 286 hello.
Customer: Ha beta ji.
Executive: Ha call disconnect ho gaya tha main ye keh rahi hu sir by lead aa rahi hai main aapko batati hu jaise white marble temple ki is mahine hamare pass 150 ke around by lead approve hui hai sir.
Customer: Pichle mahine 350 ek bhi lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main wahi bata rahi hu wahi bata rahi hu problem kya ho raha hai na ki wo by lead aapki consume karne se pehle sold out ho raha hai ab aap abhi India mart open kar sakte ho apna.
Customer: Abhi wo main raste me chal raha hu.
Executive: Raste me aap chal rahe ho to ye batao system pe to aap open karte hoge na India mart.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: System me India mart login to karte hoge na aap laptop ya desktop me.
Customer: Desktop open kar sakta hu main.
Executive: Main keh rahi hu abhi ye number ye number ye number aapka to baat kar sakta hu main is number se.
Customer: Aap dekho aap is number pe call kar sakte ho mujhe theek hai aur main aapko bata rahi hu.
Executive: Is number pe call kar sakta hu main aapko.
Executive: Abhi koi employee wagera nahi hai aapke pass.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Employee hai na sir aapke pass jo use karte hai.
Customer: Koi nahi hai abhi.
Executive: Achcha koi nahi hai to ek kam aap karna main aapko batati hu aap free hoke mujhe call bhi kar lena aur dusra ek kam aap aur karna jab aap free hoge na to aap us time pe apna India mart login karna theek hai phone me ya system me main aapko process bata deti hu kya karna hai jab aap login karoge system me.
Customer: Laptop laptop nahi hai abhi hamare pass laptop nahi hai mobile se kar lenge.
Customer: Kal kar leta hu aapko kal kal kar leta hu phone me aapko.
Executive: Na lekin main ek cheez aapko ye bata rahi hu ki phone me bhi option aa jayega sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Phone me kaise aayega main batati hu jab aap India mart open karoge na phone me.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To waha pe latest by lead pe jab aap click karte ho to aapne dekha hoga relevant or recent ka option aata hai.
Customer: Mere mere mere ko pata nahi hai na.
Executive: Ha main wahi keh rahi hu main aapko bata rahi hu kahan pe wo option dikhta hai sir main aapko wahi cheez bata rahi hu.
Customer: Aji main India mart me main jankar nahi hu iska.
Executive: Main ye keh rahi hu aap by lead wagera to purchase karte ho na India mart se.
Customer: Main bol raha hu kal baat kar lunga main thoda hospital me hu.
Executive: Achcha chaliye main aapko kal call kar leti hu kitne baje call kar lu kal.
Customer: Kal main aapko batayi lunch ke baad aap do se teen ke beech me call karte ho us time pe na hum lunch karte hai to aap 3 baje ke baad karna mujhe theek hai.
Executive: Ha ha ha theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he is not getting buyleads.

- Customer is not familiar with IndiaMART features.

- Customer is in the hospital.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check buyleads on the app.

- Executive offered to call back the next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day after 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mobile app, follow up
